ComicInfo.Title: Birds of Stymphalis
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 1 of "The Incredible Herc" Hercules ... Ares ... S.H.I.E.L.D. What more could you ask for?
Last issue of Incredible Hulk, continues with Incredible Hercules #113
